nodes.text: The Chamber of Banishment was located in the deepest part of the Rancor Cave near the Nightsister Stronghold on Dathomir, homeworld of the Nightsisters. It was guarded by Nightsisters and required the Key of Exile to open. Axkva Min was trapped within the chamber.

The Chamber of Banishment appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
